channel.title: Cleaning my hard drive
channel.description: I have 7GB out of 72GB on my hard drive and a disc cleanup didn't help. I try sorting things from it's size but the folders wont sort right. What's an easy way of finding things that are using up most of my hard drive?

item.title: Cleaning my hard drive
item.dc:creator: @Vexx Vexx
item.description:
@Vexx wrote:

[quote=“wildskiller, post:5, topic:460502”][quote author=Nebulae link=topic=563429.msg4106219#msg4106219 date=1348010922]
[/quote]
That picture made no sense.[/quote]

wildskiller:

[size=18pt]Your an idiot[/size]

That is what the picture meant.

Read full topic

item.title: Cleaning my hard drive
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

To find out whats taking up most of your computer, just go through your drive and right click on folders then go to properties, to find the amount of bytes being taken up by that folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Cleaning my hard drive
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

Nebulae:

That picture made no sense.

Nebulae:

So how are we supposed to tell you what to delete if you don’t even know what you have on your own computer?

What's an easy way of finding things that are using up most of my hard drive?

Read.

Read full topic

item.title: Cleaning my hard drive
item.dc:creator: @Nebulae Nebulae
item.description:
@Nebulae wrote:

So how are we supposed to tell you what to delete if you don’t even know what you have on your own computer? 65GB taken, one would assume you had a few pictures or videos.

Oh and

Read full topic

item.title: Cleaning my hard drive
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

[quote=“Nebulae, post:2, topic:460502”]What is taking up 65GB? Or is it just random files built up over time? Get rid of videos/music that you don’t really need and can easily view online, put all your porn in one folder and compress it, delete all the shitty servers you have downloaded.

Are you really asking us to tell you want to delete? It’s your computer, you should know what is on it yourself. o.O[/quote]

I never download anything and I don’t have videos or pictures.

Your an idiot. I don’t download shitty servers; I have my own. I don’t watch porn; my computer can’t even handle youtube videos.

Read full topic

item.title: Cleaning my hard drive
item.dc:creator: @Nebulae Nebulae
item.description:
@Nebulae wrote:

What is taking up 65GB? Or is it just random files built up over time? Get rid of videos/music that you don’t really need and can easily view online, put all your porn in one folder and compress it, delete all the shitty servers you have downloaded.

Are you really asking us to tell you want to delete? It’s your computer, you should know what is on it yourself. o.O

Read full topic
